alert.note: Alert for Coastal Bryan; Coastal Chatham; Coastal Liberty; Coastal McIntosh (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued May 26 at 9:43PM EDT until May 27 at 11:00AM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM EDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...North winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...In Georgia, Coastal Bryan, Coastal Chatham, Coastal Liberty and Coastal McIntosh Counties. In South Carolina, Beaufort, Berkeley, Coastal Colleton, Charleston and Coastal Jasper Counties. * WHEN...Until 11 AM EDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Bryan; Coastal Chatham; Coastal Liberty; Coastal McIntosh
